column4: A QUESTION: with the new 8.10 release, the 8.04 lts upgrades still exists? of all packets? or is two diffeent road so eg the fully working (instead the "buggy" existing one) networkmanager 0.7.0 can be added by the 8.4 upgrades? thx
DasEi1 thx, so ALL, or pretty all, packets (and not the securiy/patches only) will remain upgraded? thx
yes until they come out with another LTS Release
